| History                 = Worldform, Inc is a planetary engineering corporation which rebuilds worlds to the specifications of their clients. Even if the planet is already populated, they will exterminate its inhabitants to customize the world.{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 37}} It is apparently active throughout the galaxy and one of its androids [[Ramrod (Alien) (Earth-616)|Ramrod]] had visited a thousand worlds in its service to Worldform, Inc.{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 36}} They were contracted by a race whose sun had gone supernova which needed a world with a glass-like surface. Worldform, Inc. had no such world but selected Earth and sent four of their "Doom-Carrier" robots to flatten the Earth which were stopped by [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]].{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 37}}
